data.title: Troublemaker (featuring Kat James)
data.meta_description: Contact Troublemaker (featuring Kat James) from Conroe on The Bash. Browse Rock Band prices, photos, and 4 reviews, with a rating of 5 out of 5.
data.text: "TROUBLEMAKER" (featuring Kat James) is the "The Texas Legend". TROUBLEMAKER is billed and publicized in the Texas Music Office as the "longest running female-fronted rock band in Texas". "TROUBLEMAKER" is a versatile, 4 piece, female fronted rock band performing all types of rock and roll. The bands members all have a minimum of 30 years experience EACH in the music business. All seasoned musicians and all members perform vocals. They have also in the past performed a "Janis Joplin" tribute act since Kat does sound so much like her, and they recorded a full CD in her honor. The band is always professional and punctual. A large variety of rock and classic rock music. The stage show size can always be modified to fit the event size or the venue size. They have performed regularly at large festivals, rallies, County Fairs, club circuit, all the way down to small private events and family affairs at home. Always specify any attire preference or any other special personal requests that you may have. "Kat James and Troublemaker" always look forward to providing great entertainment for your special event and always "aim to please". With 4 albums to their credit and working on a future 5th release, "TROUBLEMAKER" continues to thrive and move forward. Thank you so much for interest in TROUBLEMAKER and please keep them in mind for your next event.
